body:
This issue should include `preference-experiment`s use of the API:

During execution, any `preference-experiment` recipes we execute should store (using the driver storage) in a list shared between recipes the slug of the experiment they're processing. The action should register a post-recipe-execution callback that reads this list, stops any active experiments that are not in this list (and thus not reported as active by the server), and then empties the list.
